input.title: request of get health report
input.description: GET the health status of hackathon server. Return different items according to query key 'q'

q.description: item to report health. For example 'mysql' or 'all'. Report basic items if absent

output.title: response of get health report
output.description: output of health status, should contain an overall status and a list of sub items

status.description: overall status of the health report. 'ok' means everything is ok. 'warning' means it's working but might have issues. 'error' means it's not working.

report_time.description: time of current time on server

up.description: running time lasted since the start of applicaton
